law.catch_line: If a Youth Apprenticeship Program is established under the authority granted under this subtitle, th...
law.text:
If a Youth Apprenticeship Program is established under the authority granted under this subtitle, the Secretary of Labor, Licensing, and Regulation may:
Determine the amount that is needed to fund the grants awarded under this subtitle; and
Submit this information to the Department of Budget and Management for inclusion in the annual budget.
